page.title: 17A lecturer living at Univ.
page.content: I get up around 8 am. For breakfast I have two Weetabix and a cup of coffee. I work in the History Department at the university and teach about 55 students. For recreation and some shopping I stay in the university. I do not go to church but for medical treatment I go to the University Health Centre. When I do have to go out of the university I go by bus or get a lift in a car. In my spare time I read, go to the cinema or theatre, sometimes I listen to music or jog around the university. My flat consists of 3 rooms, a lounge with a small kitchen, 1 bedroom and bathroom. All my rooms are furnished. Sometimes when the students have end of term parties it is noisy but mostly it is quiet. I cook for myself or eat in a cafeteria here. I live here because it is convenient for my work.
